short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically translate YouTube comments using the Google-Translate API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After installation, any previously opened YouTube page must be reloaded.

This extension allows the user to translate YouTube comments with the click of a single button right next to the header of the comment. This is useful, i.e. when listening to music from other countries. The sourcecode is openly available on GitHub.
